summary_rationale: ALL EXIT CRITERIA MET AND EXCEEDED: (1) 7 contested domains identified (required ≥2), (2) 6 meaning drift transformations documented (required ≥3), (3) 5 chronic errors tolerated identified (required ≥1), (4) 5 epistemic gatekeepers documented (required ≥1), (5) 4 executive truth contradictions identified (required ≥1).
